title: Hyperswitch | Control-center
introduction: Hyperswitch offers scalable pricing solutions for businesses, ranging from free plans to enterprise scale, with tailored pricing options that adjust to the needs of the users. The platform provides a range of features for payment processing, control center management, compliance, and support.
features: All payment provider integrations, payment methods & payment flows
Key services - Routing, FRM, Payouts & Reconciliation
Web SDK, native mobile SDK integration (Android, iOS, React Native)
New feature requests from adopters are taken up and delivered by the Hyperswitch team on priority

faqs.question: What is the pricing for getting started quickly and accepting payments?
Is customisation supported by the Hyperswitch team for all plans?
faqs.answer: Customisation is supported on a case-by-case basis for enterprise plans, not supported for other plans.

faqs.question: What type of support is provided by Hyperswitch?
faqs.answer: Free support is available through the Public Slack channel and email. Dedicated support is chargeable.
